articles.title: Google claims ‘quantum advantage’ again — but researchers are sceptical
articles.summary_kr: The firm says it has solved a problem on a quantum processor faster than a classical computer, and is optimistic about future scientific applications.

articles.title: People with some cancers live longer after a COVID vaccine
articles.summary_kr: mRNA vaccines seem to boost the effectiveness of an immune therapy for skin and lung cancer ― in an unexpected way.

articles.title: Surprise meteorite debris uncovered on Moon’s far side
articles.summary_kr: The rare samples, uncovered by China’s Chang’e-6 mission, might help to reveal secrets of how the Solar System evolved.

articles.title: US PhD admissions shrink as fears over Trump’s cuts take hold
articles.summary_kr: Some doctoral programmes are admitting no students at all amid uncertainty about federal science funding.

articles.title: What’s the cap on human energy expenditure? Elite athletes reveal ‘metabolic ceiling’
articles.summary_kr: When athletes devote large amounts of energy to running or cycling, they unconsciously cut back on energy output elsewhere.
